reviews.review:
Still good.  All the things that made Portal 1 an unexpected hit, re-done with a big budget.
(OK, the "be amazed at our fancy physics engine" on-rails ride at the very start hasn't aged well, but the rest is good.)
Funny and really interesting story. Good puzzles. If you have megalophobia, you shouldn't play this game.
очень классная игра, всем любителям головоломок рекомендуется! (если вы прожили жизнь и не играли в портал, для чего вы существовали??)

good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game good game
c'est le meuilleur jeu au quelle j'ai jouer et j'ai baucoup de jeu
Short main story - finished in 4 hours and 30 minutes. Wish there was more

What do I even have to say?
Its a wonderful second game to Portal!
cool thaNks valve when we getting number 3??

I love this game.  super re playable and is a good escape when I need to unwind for the day.  the story and voice acting are amazing and all around fun. the team mode is just as fun if not more.  highly recommend.
Игра не плохая, интересная. Играть в кооперативным режиме намного интересней, особенно если тимейт нормальный.
This game is especially made for nerds. It gets you thinking and is very funny 100% recommend
First game I ever played (i'm pretty sure) still one of my favourite games ever
Great sequel to the first game, Co-op, single player, and workshop maps are all amazing. I don't know what else to say its Portal 2.
Özellikle son iki saatinde kendimi mal gibi hissettim 10/10
动作和解谜兼备，被追逐的时候很有感觉。通关后非常舒畅
第一款购买的游戏，不仅仅是这个平台，一年了，不后悔。

I love puzzles and its a nice break not trying to kill the bad guys. The backstory of Aperture is engaging (JK Simmons is the perfect voice-over for Cave Johnson). And, of course, Stephen Merchant is great as Wheatley. Portal 2 is one of my all-time favorites!

中间阶段卡关卡的意义不明。
中阶段不知道让干啥，不知道让去哪，对于找路真是讨厌至极。
讨厌极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了极了
垃圾游戏。

그냥 남는돈으로 샀는데 3D울렁증이 있는걸 이겜하고 처음 알았다는,,,
대가리 깨지는줄,,
ta buenísimo, seria épico si la historia se conecta con Half Life.

Если ты мечтаешь ПОЧУВСТВОВАТЬ СЕБЯ ТУПЫМ - смело покупай! Если мечтаешь КАЙФАНУТЬ ОТ СЮЖЕТА - смело покупай! Если мечтаешь ПООРАТЬ С ШУТОК ГЛЭДОС - смело покупай! Да ладно, чё тут говорить, ПОКУПАЙ И ВСЁ ТУТ. ЪЬЪ
Oyun gayet güzel bir oyun. Hikayeyi anlamanız için ilk once Portal 1 den başlayın.
классно круто но никто играть со мной не хочет

10 év eltelt, ez a remekmű viszont egy percet sem öregedett. Minden túlzást mellőzve: Meghatározó szerepet tölt be a mai napig a személyiségem alakulásában/fejlődésében.

Kötelezővé tenném az iskolákban évente 1x a végigjátszását

Portal 2 is one of the best games I have ever played
The puzzles are good mind games 
The music slaps 
The story is amazing
The characters are love able 
and the art is beautiful for the eyes 
Its even better than portal 1 which I don't know how  but they made a sequel thats good for once in this industry. 
overall 10/10 game
also its very fun to play (and troll) friends with in multi :)
Если вы купите эту игру и пройдёте её то вам почему-то будет грустно. Советую. 1000000000 картофельных батареек из 10
Игра очень своеобразна,в одиночку не так интересно,но с другом и смешно и интересно,советую

Portal 2 coś dla mnie. Żeby przejść trzeba myśleć! Ja przechodząc fabułę na 1 etapie myślalem do 1h jak przejść i to mi się podoba. Nie tak jak inni, że nudne jest że trzeba myśleć od tego jest ta gra. Byłem tak zadowolony że po kilku miesiącach zagrałem jeszcze raz fabule

A true classic, lot of fun, brain fucking.

Even better in coop with a friend.
Fazlasıyla eğlenceli özellikle duosu ve beyin yakıyor.
I've played it for years and it never gets old
holy shit this game is great
엔딩음악 한번 들으면 2주동안 머리에서 안 떠남

포탈 1의 미래적이고 깔금한 분위기가 좋았는데
다 녹슬고 부숴진 칙칙한 포탈2는 계속 보고 있자니 더럽고 산만해서 머리가 지치고 빨리 지루해진다
자꾸만 떠들어 대는 로봇들도 씨끄럽다
쿨타임 돌때마다 엔딩 도전하는데 지루해서 맨날 삭제함
Portal puzzles very fun, but difficult sometimes. Story is great with great characters. 11/10

this game is amazing its made by the people who made half life but no guns just bullets not for everyone though and that's okay half life you have weapons portal you have a portal gun I say if didn't played first one go its good to but little more shorter this game is little bit longer but great I would do it in order
literally the best game. so good.

played this game 8 hours straight with a friend. 11 years ago this game was made, it's still worth playing playing in 2021. highly recommend playing this game if you are stuck at home bored of all the mindless killing games and need something to make you think.  

plus the game is 10 bucks. not a lot of old games are that cheap all the time.
Re pa jugarlo con un amigo con sobrepeso que comer vapor :3
I give negative review because Universe needs balance.
Realy good and the grafics are amazing

Absolutely incredible!
This is a huge step-up from the first game, and that's saying a lot, This is a master piece, the music is brilliant, the story is incredible, the characters are really well-written and there isn't a "bad" character, there is honestly nothing I can say bad about this game. This is a perfect game that I would strongly recommend! Good job, valve!
I've been playing the Coop mode and it's very pog

everyone says "this game still holds up after all these years" and i was skeptical, but i finished the game for the first time (owned it for literal years) and i can confidently say that this is one of the best games of all time, with moments that made my jaw drop, not because of a huge twist but because it was awe inspring.

KURDE PIĘKNA GRA I ZDECYDOWANIE SIĘ POPRAWILI BO WIDAĆ RÓŻNICE POMIĘDZY PORTAL1 A PORTAL2,
ogółem to grafika prze cudowna a fabuła 10/10, gra godna polecenia ;)
